Articles.Content:
How difficult would it be, to impliment the ability to be able to 'cycle thru' various node positions on a part when building?

i find myself wishing that i could move a node to be able to attach to a part in a different way. Eg. Attaching 1 truss/girder to centre of another, not just the ends.

anyhoo, just wondering how much of pain itd be for i suppose everyone who makes parts to impliment it? 

Edit - too difficult then eh  oh well. Nvm

 

Edited April 25, 2016 by Tr1gg3r
Too hard then?
